example.text: The way pharmaceutical companies price insulin is arbitrary and unfair. It’s time we put an end to this practice ? [[url]]

College data reporting gives very little actual information to figure out graduation outcomes – and that needs to change. Our bipartisan College Transparency Act will modernize this process and make picking a college more transparent for students and families.

We passed legislation to support endangered fish last year, and our Palisade High School students are helping make sure that the work goes swimmingly. Kiss a razorback sucker and celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Endangered Species Act! [[url]] [[url]]

College data reporting gives very little actual information to figure out graduation outcomes – and that needs to change. Our bipartisan College Transparency Act will modernize this process and make picking a college more transparent for students and families.
Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to the en bloc consideration of the following Senate resolutions introduced earlier today: S Res. 303 and S Res. 304.

College data reporting gives very little actual information to figure out graduation outcomes – and that needs to change. Our bipartisan College Transparency Act will modernize this process and make picking a college more transparent for students and families.
